description.value:
Potion, uncommon
This effervescent, crimson liquid is commonly held in a thin, glass vial capped in green wax. When you drink this elixir, its effects last for 8 hours. While the elixir is in effect, you canâ€™t fall asleep by normal means. You have advantage on saving throws against effects that would put you to sleep. If you are affected by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.KhwiSi9fwVfUPtku]{sleep} spell, your current hit points are considered 10 higher when determining the effects of the spell.
